question: Who is the new prosecution director  of Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) ?
explanation: Sudha Rani Relangi, who is  currently serving as Joint Secretary in the Ministry of Law and Justice, has been appointed as new director of prosecution in the Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) for a period of two years. The post had been lying vacant since the last  Director of Prosecution OP Verma completed his term on 24th December 2018.
